Changelog
=========

0.2.3 (2015-05-26)
------------------

- Fix bug when no match

0.2.2 (2015-05-12)
------------------

- Supports redirection to url containing a querystring
- Fix bug if rules contain '='

0.2.1 (2013-03-28)
-------------------

- Fix egg (missing /docs)

0.2 (2013-03-28)
-------------------

- Fix egg (missing README.rst)

0.1 (2013-01-30)
-------------------

- Initial release
